text.title: Beau Biden, son of US vice president, dies at 46
text.head: Beau Biden, son of US vice president, dies at 46
Sources

list.item: Paul Kane. "Beau Biden, vice president’s son, dies at 46 of brain cancer" — The Washington Post , May 31, 2015
NBC News. "Vice President Joe Biden’s Bond With Late Son Beau Was Forged by Tragedy" — Time (magazine) , May 31, 2015
"Beau Biden, son of US vice-president Joe Biden, dies of brain cancer at 46" — The Guardian , May 30, 2015
